name: devobjectivesproof
description: Installed   ☑ React   ☑ Redux   ☑ Typescript   ☑ Styled Componets   ☑ Bootstrap/Reactstrap   ☑ Axios   ☑ Dotenv   ☑ JWT   ☑ Express   ☑ Mongoose   ☑ Voca   ☑ Date-Fns   ☑ AJV/JSON Schema   ☑ Babel   ☑ Webpack
